ajax-header.description: Includes the commonly-used X-Requested-With header that identifies ajax requests in many backend frameworks.

alpine-morph.description: An extension for using the Alpine.js morph plugin as the swapping mechanism in htmx.

class-tools.description: An extension for manipulating timed addition and removal of classes on HTML elements.

client-side-templates.description: Support for client side template processing of JSON/XML responses.

debug.description: An extension for debugging of a particular element using htmx.

event-header.description: Includes a JSON serialized version of the triggering event, if any.

head-support.description: Support for merging the head tag from responses into the existing documents head.

include-vals.description: Allows you to include additional values in a request.

json-enc.description: Use JSON encoding in the body of requests, rather than the default x-www-form-urlencoded.

loading-states.description: Allows you to disable inputs, add and remove CSS classes to any element while a request is in-flight.

method-override.description: Use the X-HTTP-Method-Override header for non-GET and POST requests.

morphdom-swap.description: An extension for using the morphdom library as the swapping mechanism in htmx.

idiomorph.description: An extension for using the morphdom library as the swapping mechanism in htmx.

multi-swap.description: Allows to swap multiple elements with different swap methods.

path-deps.description: An extension for expressing path-based dependencies similar to intercoolerjs.

preload.description: Preloads selected href and hx-get targets based on rules you control.

remove-me.description: Allows you to remove an element after a given amount of time

response-targets.description: Allows to specify different target elements to be swapped when different HTTP response codes are received.

restored.description: Allows you to trigger events when the back button has been pressed.

sse.description: Uni-directional server push messaging via EventSource.

hx-take.description: An htmx extension that allows to select and swap existing elements.

htmx-template.description: HTMX extension enabling it to retrieve the contents of <template> elements rather than make an HTTP request .

htmx-remove.description: Extends htmx with DOM element click event removal.

htmx-ext-shoelace.description: An extension to make Shoelace elements work seamlessly (as possible) with htmx.
